Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Costa Portals - Adults Only in Calvia (Portals Nous), you'll be close to Puerto Portals Marina and Bellver Castle. This hotel is within close proximity of Marineland Mallorca and Real Golf Bendinat.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 94 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes, and rollaway/extra beds can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and a television in the lobby.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Costa Portals - Adults Only. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A shuttle from the hotel to the airport is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
